text:
Any act that a Grantee or UVPP is or may be required to perform under this Chapter, a Franchise, or other Applicable Law shall be performed at the Grantee or UVPP's expense, unless expressly provided to the contrary in this Chapter, the Franchise, or other Applicable Law. 
(Added by Ord. 58-00, File No. 000198, App. 4/7/2000)
